summary: Verily, this vichyssoise of verbiage veers most verbose. Take it at the Sleeping Giant Inn, as always.
descriptionHtml:
Verily, this vichyssoise of verbiage veers most verbose. Take it at the Sleeping Giant Inn, as always.

 Remember, remember, the fifth of November,.. Well ,it\'s fun playing with Textures...
 And under the mask is The Letter From GLaDOS, and under the letter is the Secret Spell book.

 Have fun with it!

Special thaks for serkanismygirl3, whose advice is appreciated.
author: Dr_Eames
